attributes.action: Give security firms similar rights as public services during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Look at giving a safe base of income for security operatives as there is workers in government building safe guarding building all during Covid-19 and potentially putting them selfs at risk of infection
attributes.background: Look at giving a safe base of income for security operatives as there is workers in government building safe guarding building all during Covid-19 and potentially putting them selfs at risk of infection

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to provide support to security staff, but it's not clear exactly what support you want the Government to provide, or to whom.

You could start a new petition stating more clearly what support you want the Government to provide, and to whom.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
